document.full_text: israeli air force and artillery struck gaza repeatedly on friday ' a day after a hamas missile hit an israeli school bus ' killing four militants and five civilians.
document.title: 9 palestinians die as israel hits gaza in retaliation for hamas attack on bus
lines_and_colors: israeli air force and artillery struck gaza repeatedly on friday ' a day after a hamas missile hit an israeli school bus ' killing four militants and five civilians.
